short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple web scraper that sends the active tab content to the backend.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a part of Alethia Forage. It's a larger app that lets you store the text of the articles you read so that you can search over them to remember where you read them.
